post.body: - it's OK. My mother-in-law has fallen for it 3 times in the last 2 months from me. lol
look at my previous tweets, not inacurate story, it was a joke... read tweets in timeline :) With-a-spoon? No, a knife. Joke :)
sorry. didn't mean to make you google her. lol
- It has been a GREAT publicity stunt for Twitter. I highly applaud them. The media and us jumped on it. :)
- YES. I've been getting those emails for the last week... at least. Just hit the twitter mainstream today I guess...
I fully agree with you. I think we'll be seeing very creative uses of social media in '09 because of the economy. I know I will!
glad I'm sending traffic your way :) Jerk-A-Jerk will be HUGE in 2009! I wish it was avail. now. I know a jerk. lol
- will do and thank you!
- Doggy ebook going good. :) My client will be launching it late next week. Will post the details on my blog when it launches.
- I'm sorry... it's too late to call me jiah.
79 year-old man buys lotto tickets. Dies of heart attack. A month later, wife cashes in ticket for $10 Million. Wow! http://TwitPWR.com/1jk/
No, with a knife. (sorry, bad joke) Just tired of all this phishing...
Wow. Can't remember her last name... Just saw that actress Reese... stabbed herself. CRAZY.
Hey kids! Today's twitter letter of the days is: P for Phishing. Tomorrows letter will be C for Change... as in your password!
On average, I'd say I get about 20 phishing twitter emails a day. Almost all are well-known internet marketer names. All go into the twash.
What do you think will be THE top marketing strategy in 2009? Social media? Video? Buzz? Word of mouth? Publicity? Smoke signals? What?
What's going on with all of these fake ID's following me & others - ton's of fake Eban Pagan's, derekhgehl's, and many others...
spent day marketing, copywriting, blogging, thinking, talking, working, sitting, walking, and I even had time to dance the jig five times.
Open to all: What is the fastest way to become the recognized expert on something? Write a book? Interview people? Website? Ads? What?
Launching 2 new websites very soon that have "something" to do with Twitter. Ha ha.... you guys are going to love this! Get ready...
